Subject: Add agent to server and make new daily report
Description: Hello, We need to add the agent to a new server and then make a daily report for a specific folder, with the same criteria as our Sensitive Activity report we run weekly on other servers.
What_We_Know__c: Customer is requesting assistance setting up monitoring on a new server so they can configure reporting on one of the folders in the same way that they have others configured.
Next_Steps__c: Sent instructions for adding a new server to monitoring based on current configuration and also sent a time trade link for direct assistance. Awaiting reply.
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom
Need a report to see what sensitive data exists in the directory \FILESHAREDepartmentsLL Documents


Resolution
Validated that sensitive data scans were running against the given folder and created a report to show this.
